text: The Lower Mainland (LM) is the name for the area that includes Vancouver and the surrounding cities within the Metro Vancouver Regional District and the Fraser Valley Regional District. ==List of cities and towns in the Lower Mainland== *West Vancouver *North Vancouver (city) *Vancouver *Richmond *Delta *White Rock *Burnaby *Coquitlam *Pitt Meadows *Maple Ridge *Surrey *Langley (city) *Mission *Abbotsford *Chilliwack *Agassiz *Hope Category:Geography of British Columbia
